component.name: NowPlaying
component.script:
function init() m.top.backgroundUri = "" m.top.backgroundColor = "0x222222"
m.metadataTask = createObject("RoSGNode", "MetadataLoader")
m.metadataTask.observeField("artist", "updateArtist") m.metadataTask.observeField("title", "updateTitle") m.metadataTask.observeField("album", "updateAlbum")
m.metadataTask.control = "RUN" end function
function updateArtist() artistLabel = m.top.findNode("artistLabel") artistLabel.text = m.metadataTask.artist end function
function updateTitle() titleLabel = m.top.findNode("titleLabel") titleLabel.text = m.metadataTask.title end function
function updateAlbum() titleLabel = m.top.findNode("albumLabel") titleLabel.text = m.metadataTask.title end function
